entries.@mongoose_perk1_core_lvl1_description:
• Frag Grenade explodes on collision with hostiles.

Tip: Screw the cooking. Take the pin out and throw it!
entries.@mongoose_perk1_core_lvl2_description:
• Frag Grenade explodes on collision with hostiles.

• Mongoose receives 30% less damage from his own explosions.
entries.@mongoose_perk1_core_lvl3_description:
• Frag Grenade explodes on collision with hostiles.

• Mongoose receives 50% less damage from his own explosions.

• Your explosions have 15% chance to ignite targets.
entries.@mongoose_perk1_core_lvl4_description:
• Frag Grenade explodes on collision with hostiles.

• Mongoose receives 50% less damage from his own explosions.

• Your explosions have 25% chance to ignite targets.

• +10% explosion damage.
entries.@mongoose_perk1_core_lvl5_description:
• Frag Grenade explodes on collision with hostiles.

• Your explosions have 50% chance to ignite targets.

• Mongoose receives no damage from his own explosions.

• +20% explosion damage.
entries.@mongoose_perk2_core_lvl1_description:
• You deal 30% more damage to ignited targets with Pistols.

Tip: Set their asses on fire and shoot'em up!
entries.@mongoose_perk2_core_lvl2_description: • You deal 35% more damage to ignited targets with Pistols and Shotguns.
entries.@mongoose_perk2_core_lvl3_description: • You deal 40% more damage to ignited targets with Pistols, Shotguns, and Submachine guns.
entries.@mongoose_perk2_core_lvl4_description: • You deal 50% more damage to ignited targets with Pistols, Shotguns, Sniper rifles and Submachine guns.
entries.@mongoose_perk2_core_lvl5_description:
• You deal 50% more damage to ignited targets with all abilities and weapons.

Tip: We don't need no water, let the motherf***er burn!
entries.@mongoose_perk3_core_lvl1_description: • You and your teammates can see through your Smoke clouds.
entries.@mongoose_perk3_core_lvl2_description:
• You and your teammates can see through your Smoke clouds.

• You can disperse smoke with your Dash.

• Dispersing a Smoke cloud ignites targets in 8 m. radius.
entries.@mongoose_perk3_core_lvl3_description:
• You and your teammates can see through your Smoke clouds.

• You can disperse smoke with your Dash.

• Dispersing a Smoke cloud ignites targets in 10 m. radius.
entries.@mongoose_perk3_core_lvl4_description:
• You and your teammates can see through your Smoke clouds.

• You can disperse smoke with Dash or explosion.

• Dispersing a Smoke cloud ignites targets in 12 m. radius.

• Dispersing a Smoke cloud deals 100 additional AoE damage to targets inside it.
entries.@mongoose_perk3_core_lvl5_description:
• You and your teammates can see through your Smoke clouds.

• You can disperse smoke with Dash or explosion.

• Dispersing a Smoke cloud ignites targets in 12 m. radius.

• Dispersing a Smoke cloud deals 250 AoE damage to targets inside it.
entries.@mongoose_perk4_core_lvl1_description:
• Dash ignites hostiles in front of Mongoose.

• Medium chance to stagger ignited targets.

• Ignite duration: 8 sec.
entries.@mongoose_perk4_core_lvl2_description:
• Dash ignites hostiles in front of Mongoose.

• Medium chance to stagger ignited targets.

• Ignite duration: 10 sec.
entries.@mongoose_perk4_core_lvl3_description:
• Dash ignites and damages hostiles for 25-50 in a cone in front of Mongoose.

• Medium chance to stagger ignited targets.

• Ignite duration: 10 sec.
entries.@mongoose_perk4_core_lvl4_description:
• Dash ignites and damages hostiles for 25-75 in a cone in front of Mongoose.

• High chance to stagger ignited targets.

• Ignite duration: 10 sec.

• Ignited enemy kill has 10% chance to reset the Dash cooldown.
entries.@mongoose_perk4_core_lvl5_description:
• Dash ignites and damages hostiles for 50-100 in a cone in front of Mongoose.

• High chance to stagger ignited targets.

• Ignite duration: 12 sec.

• Ignited enemy kill has 15% chance to reset the Dash cooldown.
entries.@mongoose_perk5_core_lvl1_description: • You gain 3% charge to your R40 Supersling when you kill an ignited target.
entries.@mongoose_perk5_core_lvl2_description:
• You gain 3% charge to your R40 Supersling when you kill an ignited target.

• You also gain 5% charge to the Supersling buff when you kill an ignited target.

• While the Supersling buff is active, its shots produce 1-2 extra grenades, dealing up to 200 damage each.
entries.@mongoose_perk5_core_lvl3_description:
• You gain 3% charge to your R40 Supersling when you kill an ignited target.

• You also gain 5% charge to the Supersling buff when you kill an ignited target.

• Killing with explosion charges this buff for 10%.

• While the Supersling buff is active, its shots produce 1-3 extra grenades, dealing up to 200 damage each.
entries.@mongoose_perk5_core_lvl4_description:
• You gain 3% charge to your R40 Supersling when you kill an ignited target.

• You also gain 5% charge to the Supersling buff when you kill an ignited target.

• Killing with explosion charges this buff for 10%.

• While the Supersling buff is active, its shots produce 2-4 extra grenades, dealing up to 300 damage each.
entries.@orbit_perk1_core_lvl1_description:
• Instead of charging over time, the Crystalline Injection now charges from fighting in close range.

• When out of combat, the Injection ability will gradually discharge if not charged fully.

Tip: Keep your friends close, and your enemies closer.
entries.@orbit_perk1_core_lvl2_description:
• Activating the Crystalline Injection no longer slows you down.

• Instead of charging over time, the Injection now charges from fighting in close range.

• When out of combat, the Injection ability will gradually discharge if not charged fully.
entries.@orbit_perk1_core_lvl3_description:
• Dashing while under the effect of Crystalline Injection creates an explosion dealing 100 damage.

• Activating the Crystalline Injection no longer slows you down.

• Instead of charging over time, the Injection now charges from fighting in close range.

• When out of combat, the Injection ability will gradually discharge if not charged fully.
entries.@orbit_perk1_core_lvl4_description:
• Dashing while under the effect of Crystalline Injection creates an explosion dealing 350 damage.

• Activating the Crystalline Injection no longer slows you down.

• Instead of charging over time, the Injection now charges from fighting in close range.

• When out of combat, the Injection ability will gradually discharge if not charged fully.
entries.@orbit_perk2_core_lvl1_description:
• Each kill increases all damage by 5% by up to 20%.

• Buff duration: 25 sec.

Tip: Killing while this buff is active resets the duration.
entries.@orbit_perk2_core_lvl2_description:
• Each kill increases all damage by 5% by up to 30%.

• Buff duration: 20 sec.
entries.@orbit_perk2_core_lvl3_description:
• Each kill increases all damage by 7.5% by up to 60%.

• Buff duration: 20 sec.
entries.@orbit_perk2_core_lvl4_description:
• Each kill increases all damage by 7.5% by up to 75%.

• Buff duration: 15 sec.
entries.@orbit_perk2_core_lvl5_description:
• Each kill increases all damage by 10% by up to 100%.

• Buff duration: 15 sec.
entries.@orbit_perk3_core_lvl1_description:
• Dimension Leap has no cooldown but costs 35 health instead.

• While below 50 health, Orbit loses the ability to leap.
entries.@orbit_perk3_core_lvl2_description:
• Dimension Leap has no cooldown but costs 35 health instead.

• While below 50 health, Orbit loses the ability to leap.

• Leaping replenishes 40% of selected weapon's magazine.
entries.@orbit_perk3_core_lvl3_description:
• Dimension Leap has no cooldown but costs 30 health instead.

• While below 50 health, Orbit loses the ability to leap.

• Leaping replenishes 60% of selected weapon's magazine.
entries.@orbit_perk3_core_lvl4_description:
• Dimension Leap has no cooldown but costs 25 health instead.

• While below 50 health, Orbit loses the ability to leap.

• Leaping fully reloads all weapons.
entries.@orbit_perk4_core_lvl1_description: • When below 70% health, dealing damage heals you for 30% of missing health per second.
entries.@orbit_perk4_core_lvl2_description:
• When below 70% health, dealing damage heals you for 30% of missing health per second.

• The lower your health, the more resistant to damage you are, up to 15%
entries.@orbit_perk4_core_lvl3_description:
• When below 100% health, dealing damage heals you for 30% of missing health per second.

• The lower your health, the more resistant to damage you are, up to 15%
entries.@orbit_perk4_core_lvl4_description:
• When below 100% health, dealing damage heals you for 30% of missing health per second.

• The lower your health, the more resistant to damage you are, up to 30%
entries.@orbit_perk4_core_lvl5_description:
• When below 100% health, dealing damage heals you for 30% of missing health per second.

• Each stack of Frenzy provides additional 2% of healing.

• The lower your health, the more resistant to damage you are, up to 50%.
entries.@orbit_perk5_core_lvl1_description:
• Spy Drone marks a random enemy.

• Crystalline swarms you unleash focus on the marked enemy.

Tip: You are now aware which enemy the swarm will attack, exactly.
entries.@orbit_perk5_core_lvl2_description:
• Spy Drone marks a random enemy.

• Crystalline swarms you unleash focus on the marked enemy.

• You deal 15% more damage to the marked enemy.
entries.@orbit_perk5_core_lvl3_description:
• Spy Drone marks a random enemy.

• Crystalline swarms you unleash focus on the marked enemy.

• You deal 20% more damage to the marked enemy.

• Killing marked enemy adds 5% to Ultimate ability charge.
entries.@orbit_perk5_core_lvl4_description:
• Spy Drone marks a random enemy.

• Crystalline swarms you unleash focus on the marked enemy.

• You deal 30% more damage to the marked enemy.

• Killing marked enemy adds 5% to Ultimate ability charge.
entries.@orbit_perk5_core_lvl5_description:
• Spy Drone marks a random enemy.

• Crystalline swarms you unleash focus on the marked enemy.

• You deal 50% more damage to the marked enemy.

• Killing marked enemy adds 15% to Ultimate ability charge.
entries.@ram_perk1_core_lvl1_description:
• Taunt targets affected by Gravity Strike or Hyperdash.

• Taunt duration: 4 sec.

• Gravity Strike has 100% wider area of effect, but has no impulse.

• +20% chance to reflect damage after you've Taunted an enemy.
entries.@ram_perk1_core_lvl2_description:
• Taunt targets affected by Gravity Strike or Hyperdash.

• Taunt duration: 6 sec.

• Gravity Strike has 100% wider area of effect, but has no impulse.

• +20% chance to reflect damage after you've Taunted an enemy.
entries.@ram_perk1_core_lvl3_description:
• Taunt targets affected by Gravity Strike or Hyperdash.

• Taunt duration: 6 sec.

• Gravity Strike has 100% wider area of effect, but has no impulse.

• +20% chance to reflect damage after you've Taunted an enemy.

• Killing Taunted targets charges your Ultimate ability by 3%.
entries.@ram_perk1_core_lvl4_description:
• Taunt targets affected by Gravity Strike or Hyperdash.

• Taunt duration: 8 sec.

• Gravity Strike has 100% wider area of effect, but has no impulse.

• +35% chance to reflect damage after you've Taunted an enemy.

• Killing Taunted targets charges your Ultimate ability by 3%.
entries.@ram_perk1_core_lvl5_description:
• Taunt targets affected by Gravity Strike or Hyperdash.

• Taunt duration: 8 sec.

• Gravity Strike has 100% wider area of effect, but has no impulse.

• Killing Taunted targets charges your Ultimate ability by 5%.

• +50% chance to reflect damage after you've Taunted an enemy.
entries.@ram_perk2_core_lvl1_description:
• Your Exosuit has 20% chance to reflect 50% damage in 5 m. radius.

• Reflected hit deals 5-25 damage to attacker.
entries.@ram_perk2_core_lvl2_description:
• Your Exosuit has 20% chance to reflect 50% damage in 5 m. radius.

• Reflected hit deals 5-35 damage to attacker.
entries.@ram_perk2_core_lvl3_description:
• Your Exosuit has 20% chance to reflect 70% damage in 5 m. radius.

• Reflected hit deals 10-40 damage to attacker.
entries.@ram_perk2_core_lvl4_description:
• Your Exosuit has 20% chance to reflect 70% damage in 10 m. radius.

• Reflected hit deals 10-50 damage to attacker.
entries.@ram_perk2_core_lvl5_description:
• Your Exosuit has 20% chance to ignore any damage in 10 m. radius.

• Reflected hit deals 10-80 damage to attacker.
entries.@ram_perk3_core_lvl1_description:
• +10 to maximum health.

• You take 10% less damage during Exo-sprint.
entries.@ram_perk3_core_lvl2_description:
• +25 to maximum health.

• You take 10% less damage during Exo-sprint.
entries.@ram_perk3_core_lvl3_description:
• +25 to maximum health.

• You take 20% less damage during Exo-sprint.
entries.@ram_perk3_core_lvl4_description:
• +50 to maximum health.

• You take 30% less damage during Exo-sprint.
entries.@ram_perk4_core_lvl1_description:
• You push back targets in front of you during Exo-sprint.

• Push consumes stamina (30%).

• You accelerate faster while sprinting.

• You retain your selected weapon while sprinting.
entries.@ram_perk4_core_lvl2_description:
• You push back targets in front of you during Exo-sprint.

• Push consumes stamina (20%).

• You accelerate faster while sprinting.

• You retain your selected weapon while sprinting.
entries.@ram_perk4_core_lvl3_description:
• You push back targets in front of you during Exo-sprint.

• Push consumes stamina (15%).

• Targets pushed back this way are briefly staggered.

• You accelerate faster while sprinting.

• You retain your selected weapon while sprinting.
entries.@ram_perk4_core_lvl4_description:
• You push back targets in front of you during Exo-sprint.

• Push consumes stamina (10%).

• Targets pushed back this way are moderately staggered.

• You accelerate faster while sprinting.

• You retain your selected weapon while sprinting.
entries.@ram_perk4_core_lvl5_description:
• You push back targets in front of you during Exo-sprint.

• Push doesn't consume stamina.

• Targets pushed back this way are moderately staggered.

• You accelerate faster while sprinting.

• You retain your selected weapon while sprinting.

• You deal 50% more melee damage for 7 sec. after the sprint.
entries.@ram_perk5_core_lvl1_description:
• Your Exosuit accumulates damage that you've reflected.

• While sprinting, you deal 150 AoE damage in 5 m. radius upon accumulation of 300 reflected damage.

Tip: Invest in Call to Arms to reflect damage more often.
entries.@ram_perk5_core_lvl2_description:
• Your Exosuit accumulates damage that you've reflected.

• While sprinting, you deal 175 AoE damage in 5 m. radius upon accumulation of 300 reflected damage.

• You gain 10 stamina per kill with reflected damage.
entries.@ram_perk5_core_lvl3_description:
• Your Exosuit accumulates damage that you've reflected.

• While sprinting, you deal 200 AoE damage in 7 m. radius upon accumulation of 300 reflected damage.

• You gain 10 stamina per kill with reflected damage.
entries.@ram_perk5_core_lvl4_description:
• Your Exosuit accumulates damage that you've reflected.

• While sprinting, you deal 250 AoE damage in 7 m. radius upon accumulation of 300 reflected damage.

• You gain 20 stamina per kill with reflected damage.
entries.@ram_perk5_core_lvl5_description:
• Your Exosuit accumulates damage that you've reflected.

• While sprinting, you deal 350 AoE damage in 7 m. radius upon accumulation of 300 reflected damage.

• You gain 20 stamina per kill with reflected damage.
entries.@strix_perk1_core_lvl1_description:
• Your Glass Walls have 100% more lifetime.

• You can throw Wall Grenades 100% further.
entries.@strix_perk1_core_lvl2_description:
• Your Glass Walls have 100% more lifetime.

• You can throw Wall Grenades 100% further.

• Glass Walls you create become 25% tougher.
entries.@strix_perk1_core_lvl3_description:
• Your Glass Walls have 100% more lifetime.

• You can throw Wall Grenades 100% further.

• Glass Walls you create become 50% tougher.

• Your Exosuit can decompose Glass Wall segments, restoring 10% ability charge.
entries.@strix_perk1_core_lvl4_description:
• Your Glass Walls have 100% more lifetime.

• You can throw Wall Grenades 100% further.

• Glass Walls you create become 100% tougher.

• Your Exosuit can decompose Glass Wall segments, restoring 10% ability charge.
entries.@strix_perk1_core_lvl5_description:
• Your Glass Walls have 100% more lifetime.

• You can throw Wall Grenades 100% further.

• Glass Walls you create become 150% tougher.

• Your Exosuit can decompose Glass Wall segments, restoring 10% ability charge, 10 stamina, and 10 Minigun ammo.
entries.@strix_perk2_core_lvl1_description:
• Default melee weapon is replaced by Hammer and Shield.

Tip: Stop! Hammer time.
entries.@strix_perk2_core_lvl2_description:
• Default melee weapon is replaced by Hammer and Shield.

• Exosuit forms a force barrier in front of you when you block with a Shield.

• This barrier has 250 hit points.

• You lose 5% stamina each time this barrier is hit.
entries.@strix_perk2_core_lvl3_description:
• Default melee weapon is replaced by Hammer and Shield.

• Exosuit forms a force barrier in front of you when you block with a Shield.

• This barrier has 250 hit points.

• You lose 5% stamina each time this barrier is hit.

• You gain 2% Ultimate charge when the barrier is hit.
entries.@strix_perk2_core_lvl4_description:
• Default melee weapon is replaced by Hammer and Shield.

• Exosuit forms a force barrier in front of you when you block with a Shield.

• This barrier has 500 hit points.

• You lose 5% stamina each time this barrier is hit.

• You gain 3% Ultimate charge when the barrier is hit.
entries.@strix_perk2_core_lvl5_description:
• Default melee weapon is replaced by Hammer and Shield.

• Exosuit forms a force barrier in front of you when you block with a Shield.

• This barrier has 800 hit points.

• You lose 5% stamina each time this barrier is hit.

• You gain 5% Ultimate charge when the barrier is hit.
entries.@strix_perk3_core_lvl1_description:
• Glass Walls you create apply a damage reduction buff to allies around them.

• Allies affected by this buff take 20% less damage.

Tip: Keep your teammates close to your walls.
entries.@strix_perk3_core_lvl2_description:
• Glass Walls you create apply a damage reduction buff to allies around them.

• Allies affected by this buff take 25% less damage.

• Exosuit stamina regenerates x3 faster in proximity to a Glass Wall.
entries.@strix_perk3_core_lvl3_description:
• Glass Walls you create apply a damage reduction buff to allies around them.

• Allies affected by this buff take 25% less damage.

• Exosuit stamina regenerates x5 faster in proximity to a Glass Wall.

• Allies affected by this buff have up to 5% chance to charge 10% of your Ultimate when dealing damage.
entries.@strix_perk3_core_lvl4_description:
• Glass Walls you create apply a damage reduction buff to allies around them.

• Allies affected by this buff take 25% less damage.

• Exosuit stamina regenerates x10 faster in proximity to a Glass Wall.

• Allies affected by this buff have up to 7% chance to charge 10% of your Ultimate when dealing damage.
entries.@strix_perk3_core_lvl5_description:
• Glass Walls you create apply a damage reduction buff to allies around them.

• Allies affected by this buff take 50% less damage.

• Exosuit stamina regenerates x10 faster in proximity to a Glass Wall.

• Allies affected by this buff have up to 10% chance to charge 10% of your Ultimate when dealing damage.
entries.@strix_perk4_core_lvl3_description:
• +15 maximum health.

• Adds a force barrier to Ultimate ability.
entries.@strix_perk4_core_lvl4_description:
• +15 maximum health.

• You take 20% less damage while your Ultimate ability is active.

• Adds a force barrier to Ultimate ability.
entries.@strix_perk4_core_lvl5_description:
• +25 maximum health.

• You take 30% less damage while your Ultimate ability is active.

• Adds a force barrier to Ultimate ability.

• Damage to barrier generates extra Ultimate abillity ammo.
entries.@strix_perk5_core_lvl1_description:
• Surfaces affected by Crystalline grenades explode when destroyed by you, and deal up to 100 AoE damage in 3 m. radius.

Tip: Shoot your crystals!
entries.@strix_perk5_core_lvl2_description: • Surfaces affected by Crystalline grenades explode when destroyed by you, and deal up to 125 AoE damage in 3 m. radius.
entries.@strix_perk5_core_lvl3_description:
• Surfaces affected by Crystalline grenades explode when destroyed by you, and deal up to 125 AoE damage in 3 m. radius.

• Killing hostiles has 15% chance to create Unstable Crystalline hazard areas.

• Unstable Crystalline hazard areas explode in 2.5 seconds.
entries.@strix_perk5_core_lvl4_description:
• Surfaces affected by Crystalline grenades explode when destroyed by you, and deal up to 150 AoE damage in 3 m. radius.

• Killing hostiles has 30% chance to create Unstable Crystalline hazard areas.

• Unstable Crystalline hazard areas explode in 2.5 seconds.
entries.@strix_perk5_core_lvl5_description:
• Surfaces affected by Crystalline grenades explode when destroyed by you, and deal up to 200 AoE damage in 3 m. radius.

• All targets you kill with your Minigun create Unstable Crystalline hazard areas.

• Unstable Crystalline hazard areas may explode instantly.
entries.@malva_perk1_core_lvl1_description:
• Pinscher Drone has 200 health and deals 50 base damage.

• You gain the ability to heal your Pinscher Drone.

Tip: Healing your drone will trigger Karmic Retribution.
entries.@malva_perk1_core_lvl2_description:
• Restoring 250 health to allies upgrades level of active Pinscher Drone, up to maximum of level 2.

• Second level doubles Pinscher Drone's health and damage.
entries.@malva_perk1_core_lvl3_description:
• Restoring 200 health to allies upgrades level of active Pinscher Drone, up to maximum of level 2.

• Second level doubles Pinscher Drone's health and damage.
entries.@malva_perk1_core_lvl4_description:
• Restoring 150 health to allies upgrades level of active Pinscher Drone, up to maximum of level 2.

• Second level doubles Pinscher Drone's health and damage.
entries.@malva_perk1_core_lvl5_description:
• Restoring 150 health to allies upgrades level of active Pinscher Drone, up to maximum of level 3.

• Third level triples Pinscher Drone's health and damage.
entries.@malva_perk2_core_lvl1_description:
• Restore 1 charge of active healing ability when ally health points drop below 30%.

• Cooldown: 20 sec.

Tip: This ability can be triggered by your Pinscher Drone.
entries.@malva_perk2_core_lvl2_description:
• Restore 1 charge of active healing ability when ally health points drop below 30%.

• Cooldown: 17 sec.
entries.@malva_perk2_core_lvl3_description:
• Healing you apply charges your Healing Station (3% per heal).

• Restore 1 charge of active healing ability when ally health points drop below 30%.

• Cooldown: 15 sec.

Tip: Heals from Healing Station will not charge the next Healing Station.
entries.@malva_perk2_core_lvl4_description:
• Healing you apply charges your Healing Station (6% per heal).

• Restore 1 charge of active healing ability when ally health points drop below 30%.

• Cooldown: 12 sec.
entries.@malva_perk2_core_lvl5_description:
• Healing you apply charges your Healing Station (6% per heal).

• Restore 1 charge of active healing ability when ally health points drop below 50%.

• Cooldown: 5 sec.
entries.@malva_perk3_core_lvl1_description:
• Healing you apply chains as damage to a closest target in 16 m. radius.

• This chain deals up to 250 damage.
entries.@malva_perk3_core_lvl2_description:
• Healing you apply chains as damage to a closest target in 16 m. radius.

• This chain deals up to 500 damage.
entries.@malva_perk3_core_lvl3_description:
• Healing you apply chains as damage to 2 closest targets in 16 m. radius.

• This chain deals up to 500 damage to each target.
entries.@malva_perk3_core_lvl4_description:
• Healing you apply chains as damage to 3 closest targets in 16 m. radius.

• This chain deals up to 500 damage to each target.
entries.@malva_perk3_core_lvl5_description:
• Healing you apply chains as damage to 3 closest targets in 16 m. radius.

• This chain deals up to 1000 damage to each target.
entries.@malva_perk4_core_lvl3_description:
• +10 maximum health.

• Healing you provide is not interrupted by incoming damage for 1 sec.
entries.@malva_perk4_core_lvl4_description:
• +15 maximum health.

• Healing you provide is not interrupted by incoming damage for 2 sec.
entries.@malva_perk4_core_lvl5_description:
• +25 maximum health.

• Healing you provide is not interrupted by incoming damage for 3 sec.
entries.@malva_perk5_core_lvl1_description:
• 15% of healing you apply to allies is also applied to you.

Tip: Heal others to heal yourself.
entries.@malva_perk5_core_lvl2_description:
• 10% more heal effectiveness.

• 15% of healing you apply to allies is also applied to you.
entries.@malva_perk5_core_lvl3_description:
• 15% more heal effectiveness.

• 30% of healing you apply to allies is also applied to you.
entries.@malva_perk5_core_lvl4_description:
• 30% more heal effectiveness.

• 50% of healing you apply to allies is also applied to you.
entries.@malva_perk5_core_lvl5_description:
• 30% more heal effectiveness.

• 80% of healing you apply to allies is also applied to you.
entries.@pill_perk1_core_lvl1_description:
• Ultimate ability has no cooldown.

• Dealing 2200 damage grants a pack of 4 Flamethrower ammo.

• Flamethrower maximum ammo count is 12.
entries.@pill_perk1_core_lvl2_description:
• +5% Shotgun damage.

• Ultimate ability has no cooldown.

• Dealing 2200 damage grants a pack of 4 Flamethrower ammo.

• Flamethrower maximum ammo count is 12.
entries.@pill_perk1_core_lvl3_description:
• +10% Shotgun damage.

• Ultimate ability has no cooldown.

• Dealing 2200 damage grants a pack of 4 Flamethrower ammo.

• Flamethrower maximum ammo count is 16.
entries.@pill_perk1_core_lvl4_description:
• +20% Shotgun damage.

• Ultimate ability has no cooldown.

• Dealing 2200 damage grants a pack of 4 Flamethrower ammo.

• Flamethrower maximum ammo count is 16.
entries.@pill_perk1_core_lvl5_description:
• +30% Shotgun damage.

• Ultimate ability has no cooldown.

• Dealing 2200 damage grants a pack of 4 Flamethrower ammo.

• Flamethrower maximum ammo count is 20.
entries.@pill_perk2_core_lvl1_description: • You gain 15% faster movement speed for 5 seconds when an ally is downed.
entries.@pill_perk2_core_lvl2_description: • You gain 15% faster movement speed for 10 seconds when an ally is downed.
entries.@pill_perk2_core_lvl3_description: • You gain 35% faster movement speed for 10 seconds when an ally is downed.
entries.@pill_perk2_core_lvl4_description: • You gain 35% faster movement speed and 25% damage reduction for 10 seconds when an ally is downed.
entries.@pill_perk2_core_lvl5_description:
• Crystalline Flamethrower projectiles revive allies on contact.

• You gain 35% faster movement speed and 25% damage reduction for 10 seconds when an ally is downed.
entries.@pill_perk3_core_lvl1_description:
• You gain the Pill Protection ability. Charge cost: 16 pick-ups.

• Affected allies take 30% less damage for 5 sec. upon ability activation.
entries.@pill_perk3_core_lvl2_description:
• You gain the Pill Protection ability. Charge cost: 12 pick-ups.

• Affected allies take 30% less damage for 5 sec. upon ability activation.
entries.@pill_perk3_core_lvl3_description:
• You gain the Pill Protection ability. Charge cost: 10 pick-ups.

• Affected allies take 30% less damage for 5 sec. upon ability activation.

• Med Drone charges faster when damage is mitigated this way.
entries.@pill_perk3_core_lvl4_description:
• You gain the Pill Protection ability. Charge cost: 8 pick-ups.

• Affected allies take 50% less damage for 5 sec. upon ability activation.

• Med Drone charges faster when damage is mitigated this way.
entries.@pill_perk4_core_lvl1_description: • Hostiles affected by Stasis have 10% chance to drop Generosity pick-up on death.
entries.@pill_perk4_core_lvl2_description: • Hostiles affected by Stasis have 20% chance to drop Generosity pick-up on death.
entries.@pill_perk4_core_lvl3_description:
• Hostiles killed with Flamethrower have a 10% chance to drop a Generosity pick-up.

• Hostiles affected by Stasis have 30% chance to drop Generosity pick-up on death.
entries.@pill_perk4_core_lvl4_description:
• Hostiles killed with Flamethrower have a 30% chance to drop a Generosity pick-up.

• Hostiles affected by Stasis have 30% chance to drop Generosity pick-up on death.

• First pick-up to drop every 7 seconds is the most needed by your team.
entries.@pill_perk5_core_lvl1_description:
• Hostiles killed by Pill have 2% chance to drop Generosity pick-up on death.

• Pick-up contents: ammo.
entries.@pill_perk5_core_lvl2_description:
• Hostiles killed by Pill have 4% chance to drop Generosity pick-up on death.

• Pick-up contents: ammo.
entries.@pill_perk5_core_lvl3_description:
• Hostiles killed by Pill have 4% chance to drop Generosity pick-up on death.

• Pick-up contents: ammo, health.
entries.@pill_perk5_core_lvl4_description:
• Hostiles killed by Pill have 7% chance to drop Generosity pick-up on death.

• Pick-up contents: ammo, health.
entries.@pill_perk5_core_lvl5_description:
• Hostiles killed by Pill have 7% chance to drop Generosity pick-up on death.

• Pick-up contents: ammo, health, random ability charge.
entries.@brisa_perk1_core_lvl1_description:
• Sniper rifle hits make enemies Bleed.

• Bleeding deals 30% weapon damage over 12 sec.

Tip: Higher weapon damage means more Bleed damage.
entries.@brisa_perk1_core_lvl2_description:
• Sniper rifle hits make enemies Bleed.

• Bleeding deals 30% weapon damage over 8 sec.

Tip: Shorter Bleed duration means more damage per second.
entries.@brisa_perk1_core_lvl3_description:
• Sniper rifle hits make enemies Bleed.

• Bleeding deals 45% weapon damage over 8 sec.
entries.@brisa_perk1_core_lvl4_description:
• Sniper rifle hits make enemies Bleed.

• Bleeding deals 60% weapon damage over 8 sec.
entries.@brisa_perk1_core_lvl5_description:
• Sniper rifle hits make enemies Bleed.

• Bleeding deals 90% weapon damage over 8 sec.
entries.@brisa_perk2_core_lvl1_description: • Melee hits instantly trigger all Bleed damage.
entries.@brisa_perk2_core_lvl2_description: • Melee and Crystalline Rifle hits instantly trigger all Bleed damage.
entries.@brisa_perk2_core_lvl3_description:
• Melee and Crystalline Rifle hits instantly trigger all Bleed damage.

• You deal 10% more Bleed damage.
entries.@brisa_perk2_core_lvl4_description:
• Melee and Crystalline Rifle hits instantly trigger all Bleed damage.

• You deal 20% more Bleed damage.
entries.@brisa_perk2_core_lvl5_description:
• Melee, Sidearm, and Crystalline Rifle hits instantly trigger all Bleed damage.

• You deal 30% more Bleed damage.
entries.@brisa_perk3_core_lvl1_description: • Kills while invisible restore ~10% invisibility cooldown.
entries.@brisa_perk3_core_lvl2_description:
• Kills while invisible restore ~10% invisibility cooldown.

• +10% melee damage.
entries.@brisa_perk3_core_lvl3_description:
• Kills while invisible restore ~20% invisibility cooldown.

• +10% melee damage.

Tip: Skillfully timed melee kills can keep you invisible.
entries.@brisa_perk3_core_lvl4_description:
• Kills while invisible restore ~20% invisibility cooldown.

• +20% melee damage.
entries.@brisa_perk3_core_lvl5_description:
• Kills while invisible restore ~30% invisibility cooldown.

• +20% melee damage.

• Unlock Dash attack with Katana that deals 300 damage to enemies in Dash direction.
entries.@brisa_perk4_core_lvl1_description:
• Bleeding hostiles have a 30% chance to explode on death.

• 7 m. radius.

• 75 damage.
entries.@brisa_perk4_core_lvl2_description:
• Bleeding hostiles have a 45% chance to explode on death.

• 7 m. radius.

• 75 damage.
entries.@brisa_perk4_core_lvl3_description:
• Bleeding hostiles have a 60% chance to explode on death.

• 7 m. radius.

• 100 damage.
entries.@brisa_perk4_core_lvl4_description:
• Bleeding hostiles have a 60% chance to explode on death.

• 7 m. radius.

• 150 damage.
entries.@brisa_perk4_core_lvl5_description:
• Bleeding hostiles always explode on death.

• 9 m. radius.

• 150 damage.
entries.@brisa_perk5_core_lvl1_description:
• Sniper rifles deal additional 1% damage for each 5 meters of distance to target.

Tip: +10% bonus if target is 50 meters away.
entries.@brisa_perk5_core_lvl2_description:
• Sniper rifles deal additional 2% damage for each 5 meters of distance to target.

Tip: +20% bonus if target is 50 meters away.
entries.@brisa_perk5_core_lvl3_description:
• Sniper rifles deal additional 4% damage for each 5 meters of distance to target.

Tip: +40% bonus if target is 50 meters away.
entries.@brisa_perk5_core_lvl4_description:
• Sniper rifles deal additional 6.5% damage for each 5 meters of distance to target.

Tip: +65% bonus if target is 50 meters away.
entries.@brisa_perk5_core_lvl5_description:
• Sniper rifles deal additional 10% damage for each 5 meters of distance to target.

Tip: +100% bonus if target is 50 meters away.
entries.@kite_perk1_core_lvl1_description:
• You gain the Evade ability that pushes you back from targets.

• Evade distance is 10 m.

• Cooldown: 25 sec.
entries.@kite_perk1_core_lvl2_description:
• You gain the Evade ability that pushes you back from targets.

• Evade distance is 10 m.

• Cooldown: 20 sec.
entries.@kite_perk1_core_lvl3_description:
• You gain the Evade ability that pushes you back from targets.

• Evade distance is 10 m.

• You move 25% faster while Evading.

• Cooldown: 20 sec.
entries.@kite_perk1_core_lvl4_description:
• You gain the Evade ability that pushes you back from targets.

• Evade distance is 10 m.

• You move 35% faster while Evading.

• Cooldown: 20 sec.
entries.@kite_perk1_core_lvl5_description:
• You gain the Evade ability that pushes you back from targets.

• Evade distance is 10 m.

• You move 35% faster while Evading.

• Cooldown: 15 sec.

• Every melee hit you take has a 20% chance to restore the Evade ability.
entries.@kite_perk2_core_lvl1_description:
• Using Evade ability creates a Decoy.

• Decoy duration: 6 sec.

• Decoy attracts hostiles in 12 m. radius.
entries.@kite_perk2_core_lvl2_description:
• Using Evade ability creates a Decoy.

• Decoy duration: 6 sec.

• Decoy attracts hostiles in 20 m. radius.
entries.@kite_perk2_core_lvl3_description:
• Using Evade ability creates a Decoy.

• Decoy duration: 6 sec.

• Decoy attracts hostiles in 20 m. radius.

• Decoy blinds targets in 12 m. radius when it is destroyed.

Tip: The Tactician buff charges from blinded enemies.
entries.@kite_perk2_core_lvl4_description:
• Using Evade ability creates a Decoy.

• Decoy duration: 8 sec.

• Decoy attracts hostiles in 20 m. radius.

• Decoy blinds targets in 12 m. radius when it is destroyed.

• Crystalline Revolver instantly destroys Decoy, and blinds targets in 20 m. radius.
entries.@kite_perk2_core_lvl5_description:
• Using Evade ability creates a Decoy.

• Decoy duration: 12 sec.

• Decoy attracts hostiles in 20 m. radius.

• Decoy blinds targets in 12 m. radius when it is destroyed.

• Crystalline Revolver instantly destroys Decoy, blinds targets in 20 m. radius, and resets the Evade ability cooldown.
entries.@kite_perk3_core_lvl1_description:
• Gain ability to detonate Glass Walls with Remote Mines.

• The wall shattered this way deals up to 400 damage in a 10 m. cone.

Tip: This also works with Strix and Adamant walls.
entries.@kite_perk3_core_lvl2_description:
• Gain ability to detonate Glass Walls with Remote Mines.

• The wall shattered this way deals up to 500 damage in a 20 m. cone.
entries.@kite_perk3_core_lvl3_description:
• Gain ability to detonate Glass Walls with Remote Mines.

• The wall shattered this way deals up to 750 damage in a 20 m. cone.
entries.@kite_perk3_core_lvl4_description:
• Gain ability to detonate Glass Walls with Remote Mines.

• The wall shattered this way deals up to 1000 damage in a 30 m. cone.
entries.@kite_perk3_core_lvl5_description:
• Gain ability to detonate Glass Walls with Remote Mines.

• The wall shattered this way deals up to 1500 damage in a 40 m. cone.
entries.@kite_perk4_core_lvl1_description: • Each 8'th hit with Pistols inreases damage by 50%.
entries.@kite_perk4_core_lvl2_description: • Each 8'th hit with Pistols and Shotguns inreases damage by 50%.
entries.@kite_perk4_core_lvl3_description: • Each 8'th hit with Pistols and Shotguns inreases damage by 75%.
entries.@kite_perk4_core_lvl4_description: • Each 6'th hit with Pistols and Shotguns inreases damage by 75%.
entries.@kite_perk4_core_lvl5_description: • Each 6'th hit with Pistols and Shotguns inreases damage by 125%.
entries.@kite_perk5_core_lvl1_description:
• Gain ability to attach mines to enemies.

• Remote mine deals additional 200 damage to attached target.

• Remote mine deals 50% less damage to you.
entries.@kite_perk5_core_lvl2_description:
• Gain ability to attach mines to enemies.

• Remote mine deals additional 200 damage to attached target.

• Remote mine deals 50% less damage to you.

• Remote mine has 20% faster travel time.
entries.@kite_perk5_core_lvl3_description:
• Gain ability to attach mines to enemies.

• Remote mine deals additional 300 damage to attached target.

• Remote mine deals 50% less damage to you.

• Remote mine has 20% faster travel time.
entries.@kite_perk5_core_lvl4_description:
• Gain ability to attach mines to enemies.

• Remote mine deals additional 300 damage to attached target.

• Remote mine deals 70% less damage to you.

• Remote mine has 50% faster travel time.
entries.@kite_perk5_core_lvl5_description:
• Gain ability to attach mines to enemies.

• Remote mine deals additional 500 damage to attached target.

• Remote mine deals 0 damage to you.

• Remote mine has 100% faster travel time.
